div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Group` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Group`. Element `Group` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.active` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.active`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.type`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.membership` has a context of Group based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Group`.
Element `Group.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.code`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.name` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.name`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.description` has a context of Group based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Group`.
Element `Group.quantity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.quantity`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.managingEntity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.managingEntity`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.characteristic` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Group.characteristic.code` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Group.characteristic` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Group.characteristic.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic.code`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Group.characteristic.value[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Group.characteristic` requires a cross-version extension. Note that the target element context `Group.characteristic.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Group.characteristic`. Element `Group.characteristic.value[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic.value[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Group.characteristic.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Group.characteristic`.

Element `Group.characteristic.exclude` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Group.characteristic` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Group.characteristic.exclude` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic.exclude`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Group.characteristic.period` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Group.characteristic` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Group.characteristic.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic.period`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Group.member` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.member`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Group.member.entity` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Group.member` requires a cross-version extension. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Group.member.entity` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Group.member.entity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.member.entity`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Group.member.period` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Group.member` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Group.member.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.member.period`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Group.member.inactive` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Group.member` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Group.member.inactive` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.member.inactive`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
